name: Banana Clicker
description:
Join the ultimate banana frenzy with Banana Clicker! In this addictive idle game, you'll become the ultimate banana collector, using your skills to gather as many bananas as possible. From the humble beginnings of clicking on a single banana, you'll progress to purchasing banana farms, hiring workers, and even obtaining exotic gear for your banana!

With easy-to-learn gameplay and a range of exciting upgrades, Banana Clicker is the perfect game for anyone who loves to relax and unwind with a bit of casual gaming. Keep clicking and watch your banana empire grow - who knows how far you'll go?

Features

  • Click to Collect
  • Active and Idle Upgrades
  • Gear System
  • Fun Sound Effects
  • Prestige System
  • Lots Of Bananas

COMING SOON

  • Areas
  • Gear System Updates
  • Achievements
